tool_description: Recommends appropriate resume templates based on industry, experience level, and career goals.

experience_level.description: Career level: entry-level, mid-level, or senior-level

career_goal.description: Specific career objective or role target

error_messages: Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry-level, mid-level, senior-level].
Empty industry field: Provide a specific industry or field name.
Unsupported industry: The specified industry may not have specialized template recommendations.
usage: Specify the target industry and experience level, optionally provide career goals. The tool returns ranked template recommendations with explanations.

recommended_templates.description: List of recommended template names in priority order

selection_reasoning.description: Explanation of why these templates were recommended
